mapper.update: update org_role set name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_ = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled_ = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time_ = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by_ = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time_ = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by_ = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
